name: Borgo Egnazia
heroDescription: A five-star luxury resort designed as an authentic Puglian village, featuring white limestone architecture, ancient olive groves, and exclusive event spaces between the Adriatic Sea and countryside.
intro: Borgo Egnazia reimagines the traditional villages of Puglia as a world-class luxury resort. Built with local white limestone and surrounded by centuries-old olive trees, this exclusive property offers an unparalleled setting for destination weddings. With multiple event spaces ranging from intimate garden corners to grand piazzas, couples can create their perfect celebration while guests enjoy resort amenities including a beach club, championship golf course, and award-winning spa.

history.description: Borgo Egnazia was conceived to celebrate and preserve the architectural heritage of Puglia. The resort's design draws inspiration from the region's historic masserie and traditional villages, with winding cobblestone pathways, sun-drenched courtyards, and buildings that blend seamlessly with the surrounding landscape.
history.loveStory: Every stone, archway, and terrace at Borgo Egnazia tells the story of Puglia's rich cultural heritage. The property honors centuries of local building traditions while offering contemporary luxury, creating an atmosphere where authentic Italian charm meets five-star service.
history.inauguration: Since opening, Borgo Egnazia has become one of Italy's most sought-after wedding destinations, hosting intimate celebrations and grand events for couples from around the world. The resort has gained international recognition for its exceptional design, service, and ability to create unforgettable wedding experiences in the heart of Puglia.

exclusiveUseDetails.description: Exclusive use of Borgo Egnazia provides complete privacy across the entire resort. With 183 accommodations including luxurious rooms, traditional village houses, and private villas, you can host an extraordinary multi-day celebration for up to 500 guests. Your exclusive rental includes access to all event spaces from the grand Piazza to intimate garden corners, the private beach club, championship golf course, award-winning spa, and multiple dining venues. Our experienced wedding planning team orchestrates every detail to ensure a seamless celebration in Puglia's most prestigious resort.
exclusiveUseDetails.transfers: Private transfer services available from both Bari and Brindisi airports. Helicopter landing pad on property for VIP arrivals. Luxury ground transportation can be arranged for all guests.

faqs.q: What is the maximum wedding capacity?
faqs.a: Borgo Egnazia can host weddings from intimate gatherings of 50 guests to grand celebrations of up to 500 guests, with multiple venue options to suit different sizes and styles.

faqs.q: How many guests can stay on property?
faqs.a: The resort offers 183 accommodations across 63 rooms, 92 traditional houses, and 28 private villas, comfortably accommodating 300+ overnight guests for multi-day celebrations.
Yes, exclusive use of the entire resort is available for weddings and special events, providing complete privacy across all accommodations, event spaces, and facilities.
We offer multiple ceremony locations including the chapel for civil ceremonies, the main Piazza, rooftop terraces with coastal views, beach club by the Adriatic, and romantic olive grove gardens.

faqs.q: What dining options does the resort provide?
faqs.a: Borgo Egnazia features five distinctive restaurants including Due Camini with Michelin recognition, traditional Puglian cuisine at Mia Cucina, beachside dining at Cala Masciola, and casual options at La Frasca and Trattoria.

faqs.q: What activities are available for wedding guests?
faqs.a: Guests enjoy access to the Vair Spa, private beach club, championship golf course, cooking classes, wine tastings, guided tours of Puglia, water sports, tennis, and curated excursions to nearby historic towns.

faqs.q: How far is Borgo Egnazia from airports?
faqs.a: The resort is approximately 40 minutes from both Bari and Brindisi international airports, making it easily accessible for destination wedding guests from around the world.

faqs.q: Do you provide wedding planning services?
faqs.a: Yes, our dedicated wedding planning team provides comprehensive services from initial consultation through event execution, ensuring every detail of your celebration is perfectly orchestrated.
